explanation: [0-0] A person is holding a black handheld drill with a circular saw blade attached to it. The drill is positioned at a white PVC pipe fixed to a wall. There's another white pipe next to it, and the plaster on the wall shows signs of peeling.
[0-4] The person uses the drill to cut a circle around the water pipe, completing the pipe cutting. The camera slowly zooms in to give a close-up.

[4-15] Next, the scene moves outdoors, where the person, holding a black angle grinder, makes three vertical cuts. Then, switching back to the handheld drill, they continue cutting. After the cut is complete, they take out a section of new pipe and connect it to the cut. Finally, the person gives a thumbs-up to the camera.
